item.title: Using Obsidian for Game Development
item.description:
Obsidian is a very powerful note-taking app using modified Markdown. With a little bit of setup, it's also great for game development docs.
NoteFor a large team this setup does have problems as it is backed by git, which won't work well when many designers are editing a document. Obsidian Sync exists but I've never used it & don't know how well it would scale.
This setup is built on a handful of foundational plugins.

javalent/admonitions is a plugin adding callouts, and making them easily customizable.
NoteObsidian has native callouts, but they lack a fair amount of features that Admonitions offers.
